summary: Highly experienced Construction Project Manager with 21+ years directing multi-million dollar projects across power, government, healthcare, housing and education sectors. Proven ability to lead multi-trade teams, optimize costs and schedules, manage risk, and coordinate stakeholders from pre-construction through completion. Strong in estimating, planning, field supervision, problem solving, and building collaborative teams.

experience.title: Project Manager / Lead Supervisor
experience.description: Spearheaded construction of a $65M Honors Dollars Living Learning Community at Rutgers University's Newark campus (five-story, 153,670 SF) including 391 beds, 25,000 SF of ground-floor retail, and a 74,000 SF parking garage. Planned ahead, secured subcontractor commitments, managed permits, safety, and site logistics; optimized crane usage and material delivery in constrained spaces; coordinated interface with architects/engineers and maintained schedule integrity.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Directed multiple projects totaling tens of millions, including IPIC-Dobbs Ferry Cinemas ($12M), Learning Experience ($3M), LA Fitness Center (Union, NJ, $5M), and Meridian Housing Complex pre-construction ($20M). Coordinated permits, utilities, pile-lag/de-watering, and value engineering to improve construction methods and cost efficiency; led scheduling and workforce planning.

experience.title: Executive Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Managed Englewood Fire House and Edgeboro Maintenance Building projects totaling $15M. Expedited foundation work above water level via hybrid de-watering and dry gravel mat; accelerated interior renovations; secured additional work valued at approximately $5M.

experience.title: Construction Manager / Supervisor
experience.description: Oversaw multiple projects with coordination among Jersey City Exterior Pedestrians Stair project and Hanover Sewerage Authority; delivered sludge ponds, skate park, and park renovations. Addressed site terrain challenges with temporary road construction and leveraged in-house resources to meet project objectives.

experience.title: Construction Manager / Field Supervisor
experience.description: Renovation leadership for nonprofit organizations in Brooklyn (two mid-rise buildings for seniors, ~150 units). Reorganized operations, secured materials, and advanced project from 4 months behind schedule to 1 month ahead; oversaw damage assessment for ~500 homes damaged by storms.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Directed Rutgers' $40M 12-story Student Housing and 3-story Retail development (165,000 SF) in Camden; managed Dow Jones $4M Press Plant upgrades; executed $100M underground infrastructure and site work for Astoria power plant; managed procurement, budgets, and schedules; led fast-track coordination of excavation, piping, and structural elements.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Directed a $75M project portfolio including new construction of 3 buildings and renovation of 3 existing buildings; led pre-construction coordination of general, mechanical, and electrical trades; managed a team of 6 professionals; resolved complex prison security system issues by coordinating with vendors, architect, and owner to maintain schedule and control costs.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Directed the completion of a $65M 13-story student housing high-rise at UMDNJ Newark; supervised site operations for a 5-story parking garage; coordinated 9 stories of structural steel/hollow-core precast with reinforced concrete and exterior masonry; expedited a $140M demonstration school project through integrated field coordination.

experience.title: Senior Construction Project Cost Estimator
experience.description: Prepared conceptual estimates for clients, contributing $60M+ in additional revenue in one year; secured the company’s first federal design-build project ($15M) at Gabreski Airport; closed out projects efficiently, coordinated product installation, and prepared bid proposals to gain client approvals.

experience.title: Construction Project Manager
experience.description: Oversaw self-performed site work, concrete, masonry, structural steel, carpentry, electrical, plumbing, and HVAC for multiple projects; directed two State University Construction Fund projects totaling $20M; coordinated with university representatives to facilitate payments, field issue resolution, quality controls, and schedule updates.

education.degree: Associate of Science: Civil Engineering Technology
Bachelor of Applied Arts And Science: Structural Engineering
Bachelor of Applied Arts And Science: Civil Engineering

certifications: 30 Hour OSHA Construction Safety & Health Certificate
8 Hour Site Safety Manager Refresher/ Chapter 33 Certificate
8 Hour - NYC DOB SST: Fall Prevention Training
4 HR -NY DOB SST- Supported Scaffold User and Refresher Training
